title: Music & Murder
overview: This is the story of an accomplished video producer who is framed for murder and fallen victim to the street life. Chastity rose through the ranks of the saturated market of music video producers and directors in Atlanta by being the most creative an innovative in the city. Exotic and exclusive locations, and Stunning visuals give her the edge above her competition. She's attractive, successful, and loved by her friends family, and clients. There's just one problem, she's on trial for murder.Â Chastity's cousin Frannie Michaels the dopest video producer in Miami comes to Atlanta to help find out who framed Chastity and to help run the business when it looks like it may fall into the wrong hands.Frannie must now navigate the court system and the streets to find the real killer and keep her cousin out of jail and harms way.
